sources.name: Data_Flows
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~>  Data_Flows

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared Data_Flows = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("bdk-point-dev-01-server.database.windows.net", "bdk-point-dev-01-DataBase"),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "Data Flows"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = Data_Flows,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each ([Data Flow Link Description] <> "041 - TMSInvalidMessage")),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Filtered rows", {{"Data Flow Link Description", Order.Ascending}})
in
  #"Sorted rows";
